name: Spirit Rider
description:
Join Kona and Sho as they race down the spirit river to slay the evil spirits that inhabit the land in this infinite-runner!

Created by

Mitchell Walker - 3D Character Modeler

Milena Meyer - 3D Environment Modeler

Heather Thomsen - Sound FX Design

Sydney Nemelka - 2D Artist

Aaron Hodson - Programmer

The game was done for a school project and contains music from the anime Mushishi as well as the video game Battletoads.
